that sounds a bit more reasonable
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Bjorn Hansen 
  To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, February 20, 2003 5:19 PM
  Subject: Re: [gladiator] Re: CE: Mages & Barbarians


  On Thursday 20 February 2003 15:59, you wrote:
  > > ...so, in other words you're against making Freeze Time a fair
  >
  > attack.
  >
  > I want to be a very fair attack.  Implementing a way for team 1 to
  > have time slowed down while team 2 also has time slowed down while
  > team 3 also has time slowed down . . basically, it can get
  > interesting.  For example, suppose every team except numbers 7 & 8
  > have time slowed down.  How exactly do you calculate how fast team
  > numbers 7 & 8 work and be equitable to everybody else?

  well, you could have it be like a counterspell for your team, if someone else 
  has already cast it.  ie, team 1 casts it, so everyone else slows down, then 
  some guy on team 2 casts it, and team 2 speeds back up to normal, while all 
  other teams remain slowed. That seems like it should work. 
  Bjorn
